title: Can't authenticate my account!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I am unable to access my account, I've been trying for two hours now and I also tried everything the support page said to do. Does anyone know how to fix this problem? This has never happened before, I played last night and nothing was wrong but now I can't log in. Help asap! :)

EDIT: I also can't log onto my other account.

EDIT (2): Its 12 pm now I've been trying for about 3 and a 1/2 hours, its taken the authentication about 30 mins to fail each time resulting with me getting refereed to the support page again.

replies.body:
I live in Illinois and I have 15 MS when I play

Is there any VPN without purchase that I can use to maintain that MS when playing?

Because apparently we can't use what we have in order to play the game at the moment

It's lag for me when my MS is above 20 MS

I FOUND IT OUT!!!!! Edit:Comcast's point of access for many people in Illinois is having a hard time connecting to League. (hence why most of us are having this problem in the same area. My suggesting till this problem is fixed is to use a VPN service of your choice (such as Cyberghost to move your point of access to somewhere where it can connect to league servers)
wow gj thanks for helping :)

Ayyyy sorry it took so long for me to get to this post, but I'm glad you were able to get help from the community to figure this out. If a VPN was able to work, your ISP might actually be sending your connection in an awful route so that it can never reach our servers reliably. If that starts happening again for any reason, you should maybe try running a trace route to see where your connection is going after it leaves your network.

https://thumbs.gfycat.com/SociableScratchyCaudata-max-1mb.gif

Soooo any ETA when Riot is addressing or fixing?

Also from Chicago area, same issue. Seems like this has been going on since last night?

So, a little context here. 

The current issue going on isn't directly related to Riot in any way, other than the fact that your connection is trying to come to our servers. The bottom line of the problem is that ISP's around that area (Comcast specifically) is having some issues involving their nodes. 

Until those ISP's get everything straightened out, there's not much we can do to help them fix it. I can, however, suggest using a VPN like CyberGhost until they get this solved for you guys!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pRvuYqBr,comment-id=000e0003000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-24T02:36:16.782+0000)

> Until those ISP's get everything straightened out, there's not much we can do to help them fix it. I can, however, suggest using a VPN like CyberGhost until they get this solved for you guys!
 

I downloaded it but when I try it it just disconnects me from my wifi and I cant use anything Help!!
Thank you!
How would you trace the path so I can show Comcast tomorrow when I call
Run a trace route to our NA servers using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). The IP you'll want to plugin is 192.64.170.1.
So Riot is fixing, because I don't know how to use VPN.
Yep that fixes it..
using a vpn worked for me

> [{quoted}](name=NyanDiamond,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pRvuYqBr,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2017-07-23T22:33:43.084+0000)
>
> I FOUND IT OUT!!!!! Riot's Local service cashe for certain areas are down/corrupted maybe (hence why most of us are having this problem in the same area. My suggesting till this problem is fixed is to use a VPN service of your choice (such as Cyberghost to move your point of access to somewhere where it can connect to league servers)

i will try that, how do you move point of access?
garbage, they just did some stuff to the server on the 19th, now were having issues? it's not on our end it's not our internet provider. it's you. fix. it.
im from Illinois as well...could it be the region near the servers???
Yeah I think so, hope its fixed by tomorrow
Im also in Illinois having the exact same issue i'm also on the comcast
I have Comcast as well, but the internet is fine for everything else so I don't think its the ISP.

Illinois Crew!

It's our disadvantage to having 10-15 PING
Must be regional if people from Illinois are having problems. My girlfriend and I both cant log in and we have tried different computers
Lol thought 18 ms was pretty close to the lowest, but 10 ms that's insane
same maybe its regional, im in indiana and it isnt working
Yeah maybe, I'm from Illinois
Yep in Illinois dsont work
Do you have Comcast too? If so then it is almost 100% a problem between the ISP and Riots servers.
The current place I am staying has ATT I believe
same
i'm having trouble logging into my account as well with the same problem as you so it seems, but i'm not too sure what's exactly causing the problem
Yeah I don't see anyway to fix it, I've kept trying other solutions like reinstalling and using the Hextech repair tool but nothing seems to work, hope a rioter will see this soon and can help us.

i wanted to comment back again that it seems to have been resolved. i can log in again normally now. 
i changed nothing on my end, so comcast/riot seemed to have resolved their issue if that was the case. 

cheers
its still not working for me {{champion:32}}
im in indiana and have same issue with comcast
this started around 4 am for me, I'm also in illinois. Was hoping it'd be fixed by now but i guess not.....
Yeah I've been trying to play since 9 this morning and no luck yet

> [{quoted}](name=BasicallyBasix,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pRvuYqBr,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2017-07-23T21:18:18.269+0000)
>
> Yeah I've been trying to play since 9 this morning and no luck yet

I tried 5am
i just started playing this game, and now i have nothing.

I would like to assume that the problem will be fixed by tomorrow

In the meantime, go outside and enjoy the beautiful day in Chicago
Maybe its because of the Pokemon Fest in Chicago....Hackers shut down the gaming servers ;)
i cant seem to log in but a friend of mine is able to even though living in the same town (indiana)
He might have a different ISP
IKR!!! LOL! Infinite {{champion:432}} ult! Also in Illinois. Comcast. Internet 150mbps no problems.
I can't login either.
same here
it's probably just a problem that riot have to fix themselves
